reviewText: If you've been studying Knife fighting and weaponry, then this video will show you one of todays GREAT Knife, sword and H2H combat Masters. However, the teaching technique is lacking. As an Adjunct Professor and Teacher for 40 years, I find that an extremely simplistic, step by step approach, is the best way to transfer information from one person to another. Although Blaise is extremely talented as a Martial Artist, the pedagogy is lacking. I find that the teaching style of Sifu/Guro Seiwert of Dynamic Fighting Arts is my personal preference.
